channel.title: Project Fox V1.1
channel.description:
Okay, this is straight off my USB so it's around a month out-dated compared to what I'm working on currently, meaning there's no fear of majorly leeching the fuck out of my development ;)
Okay so, this is my Development which I've been working on for a while. This is basically a 100% blank Czar so don't expect the best of a server out of this. It has a stable economy base, the best food system (well, I think so). Features some skills, including Agility (exp wasn't added cause I CBF to get the exp from rs). Stability is pretty good, much like Dodians stability. Code is easy-read so there's hope for beginners. Tutorial Island MUST be completed to get the starter. (prevents level 3's xferring as it takes like 5 mins just to RUN though tut island lmfao.)
note: Magic spells don't give EXP LOL. I need to contact Figment to find out where he put the magic handler >_< Did I mention I still need to fix the Dupe LOL. and basic SYI protection ;)
SPECIAL NOTE: Just because the server is a CZAR does not mean it's crammed with shit, this thing has NO other sources (allstar ect) in it
[center]Information: Source: Figment F2p (Czar) Server type: Skilling, Pking. maybe quests when I can be bothered to add them Economy Strength?: Strong. What will the exp be?: So far this is it;
note: the empty ones are either not added or have no exp yet
All rates are made by Runescapes experiance multiplyed by the numbers shown.
Stat | Rate Combat: 36x Hitpoints: 36x Magic: 12x (I like hard magic) Prayer: 10x (causes a bone-economy) Runecrafting: Agility: 7x Herblore: Thieving: Crafting: Fletching: Slayer: Mining: Smithing: 7x (10x was too much. 5x too little.) Fishing: Cooking: Firemaking: 3x (10X means only 10k willows needed, bad for leveling) Woodcutting: 5x (slightly better then FM) Farming:
Updates: Doors added on tut.isle Shops added, soon to be 100% done NPC Drops started thanks to Jeddac Agility base added <3 (pic coming soon) Camelot tele added. Teletabs started, models added to the client <3 all of Varrocks shops are 100% runescape Magic exp on the teleports X by 12 now Arrows now show the exact amount that you are wielding, beforehand it only displayed the item's ID, before that it showed "190" Ardoungne teleport added Teleports being a bit nerfed so you dont glitch when in combat Food 100% up until 377 food, jublys and monkfish included. Fishing started. [s]Clues also started, very basic; but effective.[/s](in my next release ;)) Potions being re-done. Added agility shortcuts to some areas, just need to add some emotes. Arrows will delete on use when I compile next. (only in wild) Farming base made: probably exactly like delta's, very basic use item on object, show emote and give an item. (never got around to this LOL) [s]Adding poison.[/s] Some npcs added, npc drops done. Magic should be able to use staffs, combo runes(steam, mud, ect) and basic runes if magic is handled in client.java (there's no .cfg ;)) [s]Working on Gmaul spec to be 100%[/s] Removed [s]Used the OLD crappy Czar Gmaul spec to make the MSB spec (works pretty well imo lol)[/s] Removed.
Areas finished: Lummy Fally Varrock
Teleports added: Varrock Fally Lummy Ardy Cammy Paddewa <-- added because I was sick of searching for edge's fricking coods lol.
So far, here's some pictures: [URL=http://img16.imageshack.us/i/tutorialisland.png/][IMG]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/5372/tutorialisland.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img193.imageshack.us/i/tutorialislanddialogues.png/][IMG]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/591/tutorialislanddialogues.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img34.imageshack.us/i/vannaka.png/][IMG]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/473/vannaka.png[/img][/URL] the above is mainly focused on to represent how many times I can use a single NPC to talk [URL=http://img32.imageshack.us/i/starterd.png/][IMG]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/2595/starterd.png[/img][/URL]
Equipment Requirements [URL=http://img147.imageshack.us/i/equipmentreqs.png/][IMG]http://img147.imageshack.us/img147/3407/equipmentreqs.png[/img][/URL]
Arrows showing correct amount on login: [URL=http://img268.imageshack.us/i/arrowshow.png/][IMG]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/9084/arrowshow.png[/img][/URL]
Agility skill used to go to other areas's of the world! ;) [URL=http://img22.imageshack.us/i/agilityshortcuts.png/][IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/2163/agilityshortcuts.png[/img][/URL]
Some proof this isn't a DeltaScape server; [URL=http://img24.imageshack.us/i/nondeltalol.png/][IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/1562/nondeltalol.png[/img][/URL] Notice Server.CP and doors.JAVA?
NPC drop's file to show how much strength can be in the economy [URL=http://img42.imageshack.us/i/npcdrops.png/][IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/3617/npcdrops.png[/img][/URL][/CENTER]
download: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=BO5BSGH2
Credits: Me Figment Reforced_ Jeddac (did some Drops lol.)
---------------
As I said, it's a work in progress so don't expect it to be along the lines of DeltaScape or even iClarity.

@doom_j wrote:

then why do you have the WWYLTM.java? I think you need to redo your credit’s to give it to Mrs. Extrol Limited: note I think I spelled his/ her’s name right Because still Every file in that sever you have is in WinterLove v.3 if you can’t find just search Wl or winterlove because I would call this a leech

item.title: Project Fox V1.1
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

I may of misread one of the statements, but;[QUOTE]I said this is Wl v.3 and not czar[/QUOTE]

if you’re in fact saying this server is a wL and not a Czar, you’re mistaking as Figment only ever worked with Czar.

Of course, I may of misunderstood completely :).

also,

I think this is Winter Love and not czar because I haven’t seen a czar source with servercp still in it and the many skills handled like WL v.3

This is the only Czar with a serverCP, Figment made this sometime last year, not many people really know of it’s existence. Original server was called “FigmentF2pPkz”

Read full topic

item.title: Project Fox V1.1
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:7, topic:306841”][quote author=Explisionist link=topic=403030.msg2985552#msg2985552 date=1254949722]

I think this is Winter Love and not czar because I haven’t seen a czar source with servercp still in it and the many skills handled like WL v.3

Czar is not it’s own source… it was made with a wL source, and just added alot of crap to it.
[/quote][quote author=Jordiescape link=topic=403030.msg2985551#msg2985551 date=1254949696]

I think this is Winter Love and not czar because I haven’t seen a czar source with servercp still in it and the many skills handled like WL v.3

Czar == wL.
[/quote][quote author=firefox§ link=topic=403030.msg2985534#msg2985534 date=1254949154]
czar is winterlove lol…
[/quote]

Are you all dumb? or can you just not read correctly, I said this is Wl v.3 and not czar, see what I said? I was telling him or her that this isn’t czar, but it’s WL v.3 or another WL because a few people released WL maybe X5 or idk but if you could read my post right you would see I am not saying czar isn’t made from WL I am not dumb ;)[/quote]

The way you said it made it sound like you thought it wasn’t wL.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Fox V1.1
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Okay, this is straight off my USB so it’s around a month out-dated compared to what I’m working on currently, meaning there’s no fear of majorly leeching the fuck out of my development

Okay so, this is my Development which I’ve been working on for a while. This is basically a 100% blank Czar so don’t expect the best of a server out of this.
It has a stable economy base, the best food system (well, I think so).
Features some skills, including Agility (exp wasn’t added cause I CBF to get the exp from rs).
Stability is pretty good, much like Dodians stability.
Code is easy-read so there’s hope for beginners.
Tutorial Island MUST be completed to get the starter. (prevents level 3’s xferring as it takes like 5 mins just to RUN though tut island lmfao.)

note: Magic spells don’t give EXP LOL. I need to contact Figment to find out where he put the magic handler >_<
Did I mention I still need to fix the Dupe LOL. and basic SYI protection

SPECIAL NOTE: Just because the server is a CZAR does not mean it’s crammed with shit, this thing has NO other sources (allstar ect) in it

[center]Information:
Source: Figment F2p (Czar)
Server type: Skilling, Pking. maybe quests when I can be bothered to add them
Economy Strength?: Strong.
What will the exp be?: So far this is it;

note: the empty ones are either not added or have no exp yet

All rates are made by Runescapes experiance multiplyed by the numbers shown.

Stat | Rate
Combat: 36x
Hitpoints: 36x
Magic: 12x (I like hard magic)
Prayer: 10x (causes a bone-economy)
Runecrafting:
Agility: 7x
Herblore:
Thieving:
Crafting:
Fletching:
Slayer:
Mining:
Smithing: 7x (10x was too much. 5x too little.)
Fishing:
Cooking:
Firemaking: 3x (10X means only 10k willows needed, bad for leveling)
Woodcutting: 5x (slightly better then FM)
Farming:

Updates:
Doors added on tut.isle
Shops added, soon to be 100% done
NPC Drops started thanks to Jeddac
Agility base added <3 (pic coming soon)
Camelot tele added.
Teletabs started, models added to the client <3
all of Varrocks shops are 100% runescape
Magic exp on the teleports X by 12 now
Arrows now show the exact amount that you are wielding, beforehand it only displayed the item’s ID, before that it showed “190”
Ardoungne teleport added
Teleports being a bit nerfed so you dont glitch when in combat
Food 100% up until 377 food, jublys and monkfish included.
Fishing started.
Clues also started, very basic; but effective.(in my next release ;))
Potions being re-done.
Added agility shortcuts to some areas, just need to add some emotes.
Arrows will delete on use when I compile next. (only in wild)
Farming base made: probably exactly like delta’s, very basic use item on object, show emote and give an item. (never got around to this LOL)
Adding poison.
Some npcs added, npc drops done.
Magic should be able to use staffs, combo runes(steam, mud, ect) and basic runes if magic is handled in client.java (there’s no .cfg ;))
Working on Gmaul spec to be 100% Removed
Used the OLD crappy Czar Gmaul spec to make the MSB spec (works pretty well imo lol) Removed.

Areas finished:
Lummy
Fally
Varrock

Teleports added:
Varrock
Fally
Lummy
Ardy
Cammy
Paddewa <-- added because I was sick of searching for edge’s fricking coods lol.

So far, here’s some pictures:


the above is mainly focused on to represent how many times I can use a single NPC to talk

Equipment Requirements

Arrows showing correct amount on login:

Agility skill used to go to other areas’s of the world!

Some proof this isn’t a DeltaScape server;

Notice Server.CP and doors.JAVA?

NPC drop’s file to show how much strength can be in the economy
[/CENTER]

download: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=BO5BSGH2

Credits:
Me
Figment
Reforced_
Jeddac (did some Drops lol.)

As I said, it’s a work in progress so don’t expect it to be along the lines of DeltaScape or even iClarity.

Read full topic
